channel.title: Tanvir Rahman's Portfolio
channel.description: Technical explorations in distributed systems and backend architecture.

item.title: Concurrency Control Toolkit
item.description: A C++ library providing high-level abstractions for common concurrency patterns, including worker pools, task schedulers, and lock-free sync primitives.

item.title: Distributed Task Queue
item.description: A high-performance task queue built in Go, using Redis as the backend. Features include retry logic, task prioritization, and massive concurrency.

item.title: LSM Tree Storage Engine
item.description: A persistent Key-Value store following the Log-Structured Merge Tree architecture. Implemented from scratch in C++ for learning purposes.

item.title: Distributed KV Store
item.description: A high-performance distributed key-value store built in C++ using the Raft consensus algorithm for fault tolerance and strong consistency.
